Class HDLC.AddressedInputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.InputStream
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ntcip.HDLC.AddressedInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
Enclosing class:
HDLC
public static class HDLC.AddressedInputStream extends InputStream
A FilterInputStream which is tied to a specific HDLC address. Many AddressedInputStreams may be composed with a single FrameInputStream, of which there should only be one for each serial communication line.
Author:
Douglas Lau
